original_text: And he shall pluck away his crop with his feathers, and cast it beside the altar on the east part, by the place of the ashes:
korean_text: 그것의 모이주머니와 그 더러운 것은 제거하여 제단 동쪽 재 버리는 곳에 던지고

sentences.original_text: And he shall pluck away his crop with his feathers
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 소낑을 깃털과 함께 떼어낼 것이며

sentences.original_text: and cast it beside the altar
by the place of the ashes
